attributes.action: ensure all unmanned level crossing have locks, lights and warning bells
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Little Johnny Hall died in sight of his mother because network rail removed a lock from the crossing gate just two weeks before. If this lock had still been in place, he would not have been able to get on the crossing and his mother would not have had to go through this horrific experience.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ensure all unmanned level crossing have locks, lights and warning bells."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21656


Prime Minister's Office
